snippet: Choate learned how to handle disappointment and the news media early in his career with the help of the veteran Mike Stanton, another left-handed reliever.
abstract: Veteran reliever Randy Choate finds himself in uncomfortable spotlight after his throwing error allows Brandon Crawford to race home with winning run in San Francisco Giants' victory over St Louis Cardinals in Game 3 of National League Championship Series; Choate answers every question thrown at him after the game, never offering an excuse for his error.
lead_paragraph: Choate learned how to handle disappointment and the news media early in his career with the help of the veteran Mike Stanton, another left-handed reliever.

headline.main: After Gaffe, Cardinals’ Randy Choate Recalls Lesson Learned Early
headline.print_headline: After Gaffe, Cardinals Veteran Recalls Lessons Learned Early in Career
